# init(url:)

**Initializer**

Initializes a node whose content is to be loaded from the referenced URL.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init?(url referenceURL: URL)
```

```swift
init?(url referenceURL: URL)
```

## Parameters

- **referenceURL**: The URL to a scene file from which to load the node’s content.

## Return Value

A new reference node.

## Discussion

Using this initializer does not load the node’s content. To load content from the referenced URL, use the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNReferenceNode/load()] method.
title: init(url:)
